projects.name: Supply Chain Negotiation Simulation (Undergraduate Research)
projects.description: Web-based educational game that trains students in supply chain contracting and negotiation using Generative AI agents. Built core mechanics (contract drafting, AI-driven strategies, event-driven market shifts, trust/reputation scoring) and an AI prompting framework for adaptive negotiation styles; contributed to learning objective alignment and instructor analytics.

projects.name: ResearchPi
projects.description: AI-powered academic research analysis tool that collects and normalizes papers from five academic sources (arXiv, PubMed, DOAJ, Zenodo, Crossref) into researcher profiles. Implements resilient fetching (timeouts, retries, per-provider rate limiting) and enriches researcher profiles with KeyBERT keywords and LLM tagging/summaries via OpenRouter.

projects.name: Citrus Notes
projects.description: Mobile note app using React Native (Expo) and a FastAPI backend. Project includes document capture and processing with OpenCV (edge detection, perspective correction), REST API, cloud storage with MongoDB Atlas for per-user file/folder management.

projects.name: RPI Competitive Programming Club Website
projects.description: Club website to showcase events, board members, and resources. Designed in Figma and built with semantic HTML, modern CSS, and light JavaScript to ensure responsiveness and accessibility.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio designed in Figma and built with semantic HTML, modern CSS, and light JavaScript to showcase projects, skills, and experience.

projects.name: Object Detection with Region-based CNNs (RCNN)
projects.description: (Course Project) Implemented a region-based CNN for object detection with a modified ResNet-18 backbone, evaluating classification and localization accuracy.

projects.name: Image Stitching and Panorama Creation with SIFT, RANSAC, and Homography
projects.description: (Course Project) Built classical CV pipeline for panorama stitching using SIFT features, RANSAC, and homography estimation.
